text:
[Verse]
City lights are flashing
Street's a glowing stage
In the night we're crashing
Breaking free from cage

[Verse 2]
Neon dreams surround us
Steps in perfect sync
In a world so boundless
We're the missing link

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows
Dancing
In the dark
We're clear
Dancing shadows
Dancing
No more doubts
No fear

[Verse 3]
Music takes us higher
Beats are pounding loud
Hearts are burning fire
Lost within the crowd

[Bridge]
Stars above us twinkle
As we sway and spin
Feel the night time wrinkle
World outside grows thin

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows
Dancing
In the dark
We're clear
Dancing shadows
Dancing
No more doubts
No fear
title: Dancing Shadows
